short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: eShoppingAdvisor is the reference guide for safe and sustainable online shopping. Read, write and share reviews on eShoppingAdvisor.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: eShoppingAdvisor Extension is designed to enhance your online shopping experience by providing a safer and more conscious way to make purchases. It does so by offering a rating based on both technical analysis of the website and user reviews. Once installed, you can easily access both the security rating and the ESA rating by using the widget that appears next to Google search results. To learn more, visit the homepage of the eCommerce website you're interested in and click on the eShoppingAdvisor Extension icon.
